comment.author: 51039755@N05
comment._content: 705, "Clan Leslie" (second from the left) and three female tanks refueling on 14th September 1916. Prior to the first ever tank attack on the 15th September. It is also shown in other photographs and was filmed: www.flickr.com/photos/nlscotland/4699756129/in/photostream/ www.flickr.com/photos/nlscotland/4699761269/in/photostream/ www.flickr.com/photos/nlscotland/4700388844/in/photostream/ www.flickr.com/photos/nlscotland/4699756869/in/photostream/ Source: sites.google.com/site/landships/home/lists/listofmkimalet...
